## table variable

The renderer function for the iframe element. This renderer is fully scalable, and will adjust to `contentWidth` and `computeEmbeddedMaxWidth`<!-- -->. It also features `onLinkPress`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
table: RendererFunction<any>
```
